relation: It is very safe on the campus , there is security walking around all the time.
Eastern Shore is the cheapest school in Maryland for in-state students.

The food is very good. We have different carry out places on campus so when the cafe closes you can still be able to get food. The food tastes great to me, they have different selections everyday and on special holidays they prepare dinners for the students and have performances.
My experience with my dorm was fun. I got to meet a lot of new friends and I had the nicest RA's
UMES has a lot of teachers that give tons of work. It may seem like it's hard but the teachers are willing to help , so that you can pass the class with an A.
Be prepared for the bugs and smells out here. Study hard and try to join clubs and join activities going on out here.
On a scale of 1-10 , 10 being the highest I give Eastern shore a 7. It is in a quiet area and you are able to get a lot of work done. Also they have a lot of good courses and programs for students.
pageTitle: University of Maryland Eastern Shore (UMES) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {291470=Greek life is 50-50, right now because the sororities are not active on campus just yet. All sororities will be back on campus Spring 2014 and everyone is so anxious for their return., 157734=As of 2012, we have 6 of the divine 9 at UMES. We have all the fraternities and only one of the sorority of the pan. We also have a couple of social fellowships and a christian based Greek organization., 108813=Homecoming is held in January rather than right when school starts., 325973=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 216764=The School Cafeteria does not stay open late it closes early and if you do not eat by 7:45 you can't go in the cafeteria. You have to go to the Hawk's nest but it be too crowded. The food in the school cafeteria has laxative in it.}

textAfterTable: Comments Tips for prospective students Apply early. don't procrastinate Login to rate or flag the reviews Cherise from Fort Washington, MD 12/09/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 9 out of 9 people found this review useful. 3 of 82 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you are into the Criminal Justice major, this is your place. The Criminal Justice here is amazing! As well as the Math and Computer Science department!...This is the best place to come if you really and truly are up for a change and a new beginning! Tips for prospective students Get to know people around...it can make your college experience best! Also, make sure that you study more than you party...it will pay off at the end! Bang for the buck Overall, i give the school an A..it has room for improvement! Am enjoying being here
